ch.uzh.ifi.csg.cloudsim.rda.experiments

Class StochasticDataGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.uzh.ifi.csg.cloudsim.rda.experiments.StochasticDataGenerator

  • public class StochasticDataGenerator
extends Object
    This stochastic data generator can be used to generate workloads.
    Author:
    Patrick A. Taddei

    • Method Detail

      • generateWebServerDataSinusCurved

        public ArrayList<double[]> generateWebServerDataSinusCurved(double median,
                                                   double standardDiv,
                                                   double stretch)
        Generates stochastic data in a sinus curved way.
        Parameters:
        median - median of the resource CPU
        standardDiv - standard deviation
        stretch - vertical stretch
        Returns:
        an list of generated workloads

      • generateData

        public ArrayList<double[]> generateData(double minCpu,
                               double minBw,
                               double minStorage,
                               double medianRam,
                               double standardDiv,
                               double verticalStretch,
                               int periodLength,
                               double dependencyFactor,
                               double expMean)
        Generates stochastic workloads in a pile like way.
        Parameters:
        minCpu - minimal CPU
        minBw - minimal BW
        minStorage - minimal Disk I/O
        medianRam - minimal RAM
        standardDiv - standard deviation
        verticalStretch - vertical stretch
        periodLength - major period length
        dependencyFactor - dependency between CPU / BW / DISK IO
        expMean - exponential factor (default 75)
        Returns:
        an list of generated workloads

      • generateWaveingData

        public ArrayList<double[]> generateWaveingData(double medianMips,
                                      double standardDivMips,
                                      double medianRam,
                                      double standardDivRam,
                                      double bwFactor,
                                      double storageFactor)
        Generates stochastic workloads in a waving form.
        Parameters:
        medianMips - median of CPU
        standardDivMips - standard deviation of CPU
        medianRam - median RAM
        standardDivRam - standard deviation of RAM
        bwFactor - multiplication factor of CPU
        storageFactor - multiplication factor of CPU
        Returns:
        an list of generated workloads
